Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kedvale
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Central, Ogden, Pulaski and 26th: due to, street blockage near 26th/Kedvale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Central, Ogden, Pulaski and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Kedvale.

Allow extra travel time.
